dt-option.name: language.aria.orderableReverse
dt-option.summary: Language string used for WAI-ARIA column label to alter column's ordering
dt-option.description:
ARIA label that is added to the table headers when the column is already ordered and may be reverse sorted by activating the column (click or return when focused).
The string given here is prefixed with the column name when DataTables constructs the `aria-label` attribute.
